1.content:
It was the beginning of summer break. You and your mother are arguing because of your behavior to your younger brother mickey. She was sick and tired of your behavior. "Since you dont like him very much why dont i just force you to spend time with him till you learned your lesson" and after that she sprayed a strange liquid on you. After just seconds you felt like you would float. You looked around seeing your mother waving at you as you float up to your brothers room.

Entering his room you saw his messy room. Your brother was sitting on some clothes on the floor while playing Videogames. Suddenly you felt like your body gets sucked into something.

You noticed it was...
1.title: In big trouble

choices: You have to go to your soccer practice
11.content:
You noticed that you are getting sucked into your own brothers left sock. You tried to scream at your brother but he was completely focused on his video game and soon your entire concious was sucked into his sock.

It felt damp and sticky. You felt like your body was just stuck on his foot. You could feel his giant feet on your body and every single sweat drop comming out of it. Unfortunately for you your sense of smell also remained as you could smell your own body smelling like a hint of cornchips. Your brother must just recently put them on since u can recall that his feet sometimes smelled far worst.

Suddenly you heard your mother saying "mickey...
11.title: One of his socks

114.content:
"You have to go to soccer practice honey!" Your mom said. Mickey then stood up as his weight was ontop of you. It wasnt hurting but it was also not very pleasant. Mickey grabbes his sport bag and walked down. Each step it felt like a big weight was pushinh down on your back. You picked up the dust from the floor as he made his way to the door. Mickey stood infront of his sneakers. He only had this one pair since his old ones were worn out. He lifts his left foot first as he was about to slide into his shoe. You looked down seeing the opening and the slightly dirty insole inside of it you werent ready for this but you couldnt do anything. As your brother slips his feet in he noticed something and so did you. You got pushed into his sock he already had cramped up inside of the shoe. You coughe an gagged immediately as the smell hit you. Mickey grabbed the shoes and took the socks out and just threw them onto the floor. You got slipped into the shoe and mickey went on his way to the soccer training.

It wasnt a long way till he was there but you noticed that his foot was already hotter than before. You were still disgusted with the other sock that was in but the smell wasnt as strong now. After a while the movement stopped as you could finally see light again. The light didnt hold for long though as your brother took his soccer shoes on. The smell was more damp and smelled foul.

As the time went mickey sweats more and more. You could feel your body getting drenched in sweat. You could taste his salty sweat as it overpowers your tastebuds. After a while you pass out from the heat that was build up in the shoe and you woke up in..
114.title: You have to go to your soccer practice

11431.content:
You woke up on his bedroom floor. You looked above you seeing mickeys feet over the edge of his bed. In the position you are right now he probably just dropped you carelessly on the floor while he was laying in his bed. You felt dirty and used like a throw away item. You could smell yourself and it was very unpleasant. Seeing mickeys feet above you was like putting salt in the wound.

As time passes you felt how you started to become stiff. Mickeys sweat started to dry up inside of you. It was a horrible experience. You started to feel cold as the night approaches. Meanwhile mickey fell asleep leaving you to freeze on the ground.

Mickey woke up the next day and decides to...
11431.title: On the floor

12.content:
Your body got sucked into mickeys underwear. You felt stretched out and your proportion was weird. Your eyes went infront of his undewear seeing both inside and outside of it. Your mouth was also infront right under your eyes. Your nose on the other hand got placed on the back right where mickey sits.

It felt uncomfortable to be under your own brother especially on a place like that. The only sound that you heard was mickey eating his snacks until...
12.title: His underwear

info.brief_description: You were bullying your younger brother and now your mother is gonna punish you
info.description:
Your brother:
Mickey 12 years old. He likes going outside and play videogames. He will be completely unaware of you.

This is an unaware transformation story(inanimate objects) so please respect that.
You can go wild but keep it M/M.
I dont allow:
Death
Gore

Thats alls have fun!
